alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 1:40PM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, except up to 12 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Southwest wind of up to 20 mph with higher gusts will cause heavy drifting snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...Bear River Range-Big Hole Mountains- Including the cities of Emigration Summit and Victor. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Drifting snow will hamper efforts to keep roads and highways clear.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains
